Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; GROUND
Name: Bowl
Description: Bowl with a small ring base, flaring S-shaped body and simple tapered lip. Manufactured in Upper Egypt.
